@cosaingalway @stellameehan Agree. Most employees I work with say they don't have time: If their bus is stuck in the same traffic, there's no gain. Another reason is privacy, many work via phone when in car, much harder to do on public transport. Solution is to price road space; (de) congestion charge.

@EricIdle Keep it up Eric! Every morning you can tie your own bootlaces is a good morning; old Irish saying. Our (Catholic)religious teacher showed us #LifeOfBrian back in 1980 (when banned) an affirmation of our behaviour in religion to that date. Thank you and #Python team, saved us.
Wonderful to see you @kealasettle on #LateLate tonight. The joy of being yourself.
